Unique's Servings

Breakfast
Breakfast is the first meal of the day. A good breakfast makes your day better. Tea/Coffee, eggs, sandwich, hash brown potatoes, pancakes are our poular breakfast servings.
Appetizer
Appetizer is a small dish served before meal. You can enjoy appetizer with drinks. Fish Satay, sekuwas, momos, pizza, grilled items, veg items, soups, panipuri are our poular servings.
Lunch/dinner
It is the main meal of the day. Some of our servings are rice, noodles, naan, mushroom,veg saute, mutton curry, chicken roast, paneer, whole fish tawa, prawn and many more.
